alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:20PM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Luverne affecting Rock County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, agricultural lands along the lower banks of the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 PM CDT Sunday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Sioux River Dell Rapids 12.0 12.6 Sun 10 pm 12.7 11.8 11.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
